title: Kraftwerk's Electronic Pop Classic Pocket Calculator Remastered
summary: Kraftwerk's iconic 1981 song 'Pocket Calculator' received a digital remaster in 2009
content:
• Originally released in 1981 on Computer World album
• Features lyrics about operating a calculator
• Blends electronic music with playful technological themes
• Notable for minimalist synth composition
• 2009 remaster enhanced audio quality
• Running time is 4 minutes 57 seconds
